overview: In 2010 James Franco optioned the rights to Stephen Elliottâ€™s memoir, The Adderall Diaries. In 2015 The Adderall Diaries starring James Franco and Ed Harris premiered at the TriBeca Film Festival. After Adderall is a surreal re-imagining about what happens when James Franco makes a movie about your life.
tagline: What if James Franco made a movie about your life?
title: After Adderall
